tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ShippingSchedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    departure_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    arrival_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ShippingSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    departure_date DATE,
    arrival_date DATE,
    route_id INT,
    company_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES ShippingCompany(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeliveryTracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    status_id INT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES ShippingSchedule(schedule_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES DeliveryStatus(status_id)
);
